entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is a global technology company that invests in emerging technology trends and breakthroughs, with a commitment to research and development across various technologies, tools, and platforms.

entities.name: MICROSOFT RESEARCH
entities.description: Microsoft Research is one of the world's largest corporate research organizations, working in collaboration with top universities to advance the state-of-the-art in computer science and other disciplines.

entities.name: DELL
entities.description: Dell is a multinational OEM that has distribution agreements with Microsoft to pre-install Microsoft software on new devices and servers.

entities.name: HEWLETT-PACKARD
entities.description: Hewlett-Packard (HP) is a multinational OEM that has distribution agreements with Microsoft to pre-install Microsoft software on new devices and servers.

entities.name: LENOVO
entities.description: Lenovo is a multinational OEM that has distribution agreements with Microsoft to pre-install Microsoft software on new devices and servers.

entities.name: REDMOND, WASHINGTON
entities.description: Redmond, Washington is the location of Microsoft's main product research and development facilities.

relationships.relationship_description: Microsoft Research operates as a part of Microsoft, contributing to its innovation and future trends through collaboration with top universities.
Microsoft has distribution agreements with Dell to pre-install its software on new devices and servers sold by Dell.
Microsoft has distribution agreements with Hewlett-Packard to pre-install its software on new devices and servers sold by HP.
Microsoft has distribution agreements with Lenovo to pre-install its software on new devices and servers sold by Lenovo.
Microsoft's main product research and development facilities are located in Redmond, Washington.
